original: RV_2,025.04a tasmā arṣanti divyā asaścataḥ sa satvabhiḥ prathamo goṣu gacchati /
analyzed: tasmai arṣanti divyāḥ asaścataḥ sa satvabhiḥ prathamaḥ goṣu gacchati

original: RV_2,025.04c anibhṛṣṭataviṣir hanty ojasā yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ //
analyzed: a nibhṛṣṭa taviṣiḥ hanti ojasā yaṃ yam yujam kṛṇute brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_2,025.05a tasmā id viśve dhunayanta sindhavo 'cchidrā śarma dadhire purūṇi /
analyzed: tasmai id viśve dhunayanta sindhavaḥ u chidrā śarma dadhire purūṇi

original: RV_2,025.05c devānāṃ sumne subhagaḥ sa edhate yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ //
analyzed: devānām sumne subhagaḥ saḥ edhate yam yam yujam kṛṇute brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_2,026.01a ṛjur ic chaṃso vanavad vanuṣyato devayann id adevayantam abhy asat /
analyzed: ṛjuḥ id śaṃsaḥ vanavat vanuṣyataḥ devayan id a devayantam abhī asat

original: RV_2,026.01c suprāvīr id vanavat pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ yajved ayajyor vi bhajāti bhojanam //
analyzed: su prāvīḥ id vanavat pṛtsu duṣṭaram yajvā id a yajyoḥ vi bhajāti bhojanam

original: RV_2,026.02a yajasva vīra pra vihi manāyato bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye /
analyzed: yajasva vīra pra vihi manāyataḥ bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye

original: RV_2,026.02c haviṣ kṛṇuṣva subhago yathāsasi brahmaṇas pater ava ā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: haviṣ kṛṇuṣva subhagaḥ yathā asasi brahmaṇaḥ pateḥ avaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_2,026.03a sa ij janena sa viśā sa janmanā sa putrair vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ id janena sa viśā sa janmanā sa putraiḥ vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_2,026.03c devānāṃ yaḥ pitaram āvivāsati śraddhāmanā haviṣā brahmaṇas patim //
analyzed: devānām yaḥ pitaram āvivāsati śraddhā manāḥ haviṣā brahmaṇaḥ patim

original: RV_2,026.04a yo asmai havyair ghṛtavadbhir avidhat pra tam prācā nayati brahmaṇas patiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ asmai havyaiḥ ghṛtavadbhiḥ avidhat pra tam prācā nayati brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_2,026.04c uruṣyatīm aṃhaso rakṣatī riṣo 'ṃhoś cid asmā urucakrir adbhutaḥ //
analyzed: uruṣyati īm aṃhasaḥ rakṣati riṣaḥ ṃhoḥ cit asmai uru cakriḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_2,027.01a imā gira ādityebhyo ghṛtasnūḥ sanād rājabhyo juhvā juhomi /
analyzed: imāḥ giraḥ ādityebhyaḥ ghṛtasnūḥ sanāt rājabhyaḥ juhvā juhomi

original: RV_2,027.01c śṛṇotu mitro aryamā bhago nas tuvijāto varuṇo dakṣo aṃśaḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇotu mitraḥ aryamā bhagaḥ naḥ tuvi jātaḥ varuṇaḥ dakṣaḥ aṃśaḥ

original: RV_2,027.02a imaṃ stomaṃ sakratavo me adya mitro aryamā varuṇo juṣanta /
analyzed: imam stomam sa kratavaḥ me adya mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_2,027.02c ādityāsaḥ śucayo dhārapūtā avṛjinā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ śucayaḥ dhāra pūtāḥ a vṛjināḥ anavadyāḥ ariṣṭāḥ

original: RV_2,027.03a ta ādityāsa uravo gabhīrā adabdhāso dipsanto bhūryakṣāḥ /
analyzed: te ādityāsaḥ uravaḥ gabhīrāḥ adabdhāsaḥ dipsantaḥ bhūri akṣāḥ

original: RV_2,027.03c antaḥ paśyanti vṛjinota sādhu sarvaṃ rājabhyaḥ paramā cid anti //
analyzed: antar paśyanti vṛjinā uta sādhu sarvam rājabhyaḥ paramā cit anti

original: RV_2,027.04a dhārayanta ādityāso jagat sthā devā viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
analyzed: dhārayantaḥ ādityāsaḥ jagat stha devāḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ

original: RV_2,027.04c dīrghādhiyo rakṣamāṇā asuryam ṛtāvānaś cayamānā ṛṇāni //
analyzed: dīrgha ādhiyaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ asuryam ṛtāvānaḥ cayamānāḥ ṛṇāni

original: RV_2,027.05a vidyām ādityā avaso vo asya yad aryaman bhaya ā cin mayobhu /
analyzed: vidyām ādityāḥ avasaḥ vaḥ asya yat aryaman bhaye ā cit mayobhu

original: RV_2,027.05c yuṣmākam mitrāvaruṇā praṇītau pari śvabhreva duritāni vṛjyām //
analyzed: yuṣmākam mitrāvaruṇā praṇītau pari śvabhrā iva duritāni vṛjyām

original: RV_2,027.06a sugo hi vo aryaman mitra panthā anṛkṣaro varuṇa sādhur asti /
analyzed: su gaḥ hi vaḥ aryaman mitra panthāḥ anṛkṣaraḥ varuṇa sādhuḥ asti

original: RV_2,027.06c tenādityā adhi vocatā no yacchatā no duṣparihantu śarma //
analyzed: tena ādityāḥ adhi vocata naḥ yacchata naḥ duṣparihantu śarma

original: RV_2,027.07a pipartu no aditī rājaputrāti dveṣāṃsy aryamā sugebhiḥ /
analyzed: pipartu naḥ aditiḥ rāja putrā ati dveṣāṃsi aryamā su gebhiḥ

original: RV_2,027.07c bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya śarmopa syāma puruvīrā ariṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhat mitrasya varuṇasya śarma upa syāma puru vīrāḥ ariṣṭāḥ

original: RV_2,027.08a tisro bhūmīr dhārayan trīṃr uta dyūn trīṇi vratā vidathe antar eṣām /
analyzed: tisraḥ bhūmīḥ dhārayan trīn uta dyūn trīṇi vratā vidathe antar eṣām

original: RV_2,027.08c ṛtenādityā mahi vo mahitvaṃ tad aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru //
analyzed: ṛtena ādityāḥ mahi vaḥ mahi tvam tat aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru

original: RV_2,027.09a trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta hiraṇyayāḥ śucayo dhārapūtāḥ /
analyzed: trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta hiraṇyayāḥ śucayaḥ dhāra pūtāḥ

original: RV_2,027.09c asvapnajo animiṣā adabdhā uruśaṃsā ṛjave martyāya //
analyzed: a svapnajaḥ animiṣāḥ adabdhāḥ uru śaṃsāḥ ṛjave martyāya

original: RV_2,027.10a tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsi rājā ye ca devā asura ye ca martāḥ /
analyzed: tvam viśveṣām varuṇa asi rājā ye ca devāḥ asura ye ca martāḥ

original: RV_2,027.10c śataṃ no rāsva śarado vicakṣe 'śyāmāyūṃṣi sudhitāni pūrvā //
analyzed: śatam naḥ rāsva śaradaḥ vicakṣe śyāma āyūṃṣi sudhitāni pūrvā

original: RV_2,027.11a na dakṣiṇā vi cikite na savyā na prācīnam ādityā nota paścā /
analyzed: na dakṣiṇā vi cikite na savyā na prācīnam ādityāḥ na uta paścā

original: RV_2,027.11c pākyā cid vasavo dhīryā cid yuṣmānīto abhayaṃ jyotir aśyām //
analyzed: pākyā cit vasavaḥ dhīryā cit yuṣmānītaḥ abhayam jyotiḥ aśyām

original: RV_2,027.12a yo rājabhya ṛtanibhyo dadāśa yaṃ vardhayanti puṣṭayaś ca nityāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ rājabhyaḥ ṛta nibhyaḥ dadāśa yam vardhayanti puṣṭayaḥ ca nityāḥ

original: RV_2,027.12c sa revān yāti prathamo rathena vasudāvā vidatheṣu praśastaḥ //
analyzed: sa revān yāti prathamaḥ rathena vasu dāvā vidatheṣu praśastaḥ

original: RV_2,027.13a śucir apaḥ sūyavasā adabdha upa kṣeti vṛddhavayāḥ suvīraḥ /
analyzed: śuciḥ apaḥ sū yavasāḥ adabdhaḥ upa kṣeti vṛddha vayāḥ su vīraḥ

original: RV_2,027.13c nakiṣ ṭaṃ ghnanty antito na dūrād ya ādityānām bhavati praṇītau //
analyzed: nakir tam ghnanti antitas na dūrāt yaḥ ādityānām bhavati praṇītau

original: RV_2,027.14a adite mitra varuṇota mṛḷa yad vo vayaṃ cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ /
analyzed: adite mitra varuṇa uta mṛḍa yat vaḥ vayam cakṛma kad cit āgaḥ

original: RV_2,027.14c urv aśyām abhayaṃ jyotir indra mā no dīrghā abhi naśan tamisrāḥ //
analyzed: uru aśyām abhayam jyotiḥ indra mā naḥ dīrghāḥ abhi naśan tamisrāḥ

original: RV_2,027.15a ubhe asmai pīpayataḥ samīcī divo vṛṣṭiṃ subhago nāma puṣyan /
analyzed: ubhe asmai pīpayataḥ samīcī divaḥ vṛṣṭim subhagaḥ nāma puṣyan

original: RV_2,027.15c ubhā kṣayāv ājayan yāti pṛtsūbhāv ardhau bhavataḥ sādhū asmai //
analyzed: ubhā kṣayau ājayan yāti pṛtsu ubhau ardhau bhavataḥ sādhū asmai

original: RV_2,027.16a yā vo māyā abhidruhe yajatrāḥ pāśā ādityā ripave vicṛttāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ vaḥ māyāḥ abhidruhe yajatrāḥ pāśāḥ ādityāḥ ripave vicṛttāḥ

original: RV_2,027.16c aśvīva tāṃ ati yeṣaṃ rathenāriṣṭā urāv ā śarman syāma //
analyzed: aśvī iva tām ati yeṣam rathena ariṣṭāḥ urau ā śarman syāma

original: RV_2,027.17a māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ /
analyzed: mā aham maghonaḥ varuṇa priyasya bhūri dāvnaḥ ā vidam śūnam āpeḥ

original: RV_2,027.17c mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: mā rāyaḥ rājan su yamāt ava sthām bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,028.01a idaṃ kaver ādityasya svarājo viśvāni sānty abhy astu mahnā /
analyzed: idam kaveḥ ādityasya sva rājaḥ viśvāni sānti abhī astu mahnā

original: RV_2,028.01c ati yo mandro yajathāya devaḥ sukīrtim bhikṣe varuṇasya bhūreḥ //
analyzed: ati yaḥ mandraḥ yajathāya devaḥ su kīrtim bhikṣe varuṇasya bhūreḥ

original: RV_2,028.02a tava vrate subhagāsaḥ syāma svādhyo varuṇa tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ /
analyzed: tava vrate subhagāsaḥ syāma su ādhyaḥ varuṇa tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ

original: RV_2,028.02c upāyana uṣasāṃ gomatīnām agnayo na jaramāṇā anu dyūn //
analyzed: upāyane uṣasām gomatīnām agnayaḥ na jaramāṇāḥ anu dyūn

original: RV_2,028.03a tava syāma puruvīrasya śarmann uruśaṃsasya varuṇa praṇetaḥ /
analyzed: tava syāma puru vīrasya śarman uru śaṃsasya varuṇa praṇetar

original: RV_2,028.03c yūyaṃ naḥ putrā aditer adabdhā abhi kṣamadhvaṃ yujyāya devāḥ //
analyzed: yūyam naḥ putrāḥ aditeḥ adabdhāḥ abhi kṣamadhvam yujyāya devāḥ

original: RV_2,028.04a pra sīm ādityo asṛjad vidhartāṃ ṛtaṃ sindhavo varuṇasya yanti /
analyzed: pra sīm ādityaḥ asṛjat vidhartām ṛtam sindhavaḥ varuṇasya yanti

original: RV_2,028.04c na śrāmyanti na vi mucanty ete vayo na paptū raghuyā parijman //
analyzed: na śrāmyanti na vi mucanti ete vayaḥ na paptuḥ raghuyā parijman

original: RV_2,028.05a vi mac chrathāya raśanām ivāga ṛdhyāma te varuṇa khām ṛtasya /
analyzed: vi mat śrathāya raśanām iva āgaḥ ṛdhyāma te varuṇa khām ṛtasya

original: RV_2,028.05c mā tantuś chedi vayato dhiyam me mā mātrā śāry apasaḥ pura ṛtoḥ //
analyzed: mā tantuḥ chedi vayataḥ dhiyam me mā mātrā śāri apasaḥ puras ṛtoḥ

original: RV_2,028.06a apo su myakṣa varuṇa bhiyasam mat samrāḷ ṛtāvo 'nu mā gṛbhāya /
analyzed: apa u su myakṣa varuṇa bhiyasam mat samrāj ṛtāvaḥ nu mā gṛbhāya

original: RV_2,028.06c dāmeva vatsād vi mumugdhy aṃho nahi tvad āre nimiṣaś caneśe //
analyzed: dāmā iva vatsāt vi mumugdhi aṃhaḥ nahi tvat āre nimiṣaḥ cana īśe

original: RV_2,028.07a mā no vadhair varuṇa ye ta iṣṭāv enaḥ kṛṇvantam asura bhrīṇanti /
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhaiḥ varuṇa ye te iṣṭau enaḥ kṛṇvantam asura bhrīṇanti

original: RV_2,028.07c mā jyotiṣaḥ pravasathāni ganma vi ṣū mṛdhaḥ śiśratho jīvase naḥ //
analyzed: mā jyotiṣaḥ pravasathāni ganma vi su mṛdhaḥ śiśrathaḥ jīvase naḥ

original: RV_2,028.08a namaḥ purā te varuṇota nūnam utāparaṃ tuvijāta bravāma /
analyzed: namaḥ purā te varuṇa uta nūnam uta aparam tuvi jāta bravāma

original: RV_2,028.08c tve hi kam parvate na śritāny apracyutāni dūḷabha vratāni //
analyzed: tve hi kam parvate na śritāni a pracyutāni dūḷabha vratāni

original: RV_2,028.09a para ṛṇā sāvīr adha matkṛtāni māhaṃ rājann anyakṛtena bhojam /
analyzed: paras ṛṇā sāvīḥ adha mad kṛtāni mā aham rājan anya kṛtena bhojam

original: RV_2,028.09c avyuṣṭā in nu bhūyasīr uṣāsa ā no jīvān varuṇa tāsu śādhi //
analyzed: a vyuṣṭāḥ id nu bhūyasīḥ uṣāsaḥ ā naḥ jīvān varuṇa tāsu śādhi

original: RV_2,028.10a yo me rājan yujyo vā sakhā vā svapne bhayam bhīrave mahyam āha /
analyzed: yaḥ me rājan yujyaḥ vā sakhā vā svapne bhayam bhīrave mahyam āha

original: RV_2,028.10c steno vā yo dipsati no vṛko vā tvaṃ tasmād varuṇa pāhy asmān //
analyzed: stenaḥ vā yaḥ dipsati naḥ vṛkaḥ vā tvam tasmāt varuṇa pāhi asmān

original: RV_2,028.11a māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ /
analyzed: mā aham maghonaḥ varuṇa priyasya bhūri dāvnaḥ ā vidam śūnam āpeḥ

original: RV_2,028.11c mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: mā rāyaḥ rājan su yamāt ava sthām bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,029.01a dhṛtavratā ādityā iṣirā āre mat karta rahasūr ivāgaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛta vratāḥ ādityāḥ iṣirāḥ āre mat karta rahasūḥ iva āgaḥ

original: RV_2,029.01c śṛṇvato vo varuṇa mitra devā bhadrasya vidvāṃ avase huve vaḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ vaḥ varuṇa mitra devāḥ bhadrasya vidvān avase huve vaḥ

original: RV_2,029.02a yūyaṃ devāḥ pramatir yūyam ojo yūyaṃ dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota /
analyzed: yūyam devāḥ pramatiḥ yūyam ojaḥ yūyam dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota

original: RV_2,029.02c abhikṣattāro abhi ca kṣamadhvam adyā ca no mṛḷayatāparaṃ ca //
analyzed: abhi kṣattāraḥ abhi ca kṣamadhvam adyā ca naḥ mṛḍayata aparam ca

original: RV_2,029.03a kim ū nu vaḥ kṛṇavāmāpareṇa kiṃ sanena vasava āpyena /
analyzed: kim u nu vaḥ kṛṇavāma apareṇa kim sanena vasavaḥ āpyena

original: RV_2,029.03c yūyaṃ no mitrāvaruṇādite ca svastim indrāmaruto dadhāta //
analyzed: yūyam naḥ mitrāvaruṇā adite ca svastim indrāmarutaḥ dadhāta

original: RV_2,029.04a haye devā yūyam id āpaya stha te mṛḷata nādhamānāya mahyam /
analyzed: haye devāḥ yūyam id āpayaḥ stha te mṛḍata nādhamānāya mahyam

original: RV_2,029.04c mā vo ratho madhyamavāḷ ṛte bhūn mā yuṣmāvatsv āpiṣu śramiṣma //
analyzed: mā vaḥ rathaḥ madhyama vāh ṛte bhūt mā yuṣmāvatsu āpiṣu śramiṣma

original: RV_2,029.05a pra va eko mimaya bhūry āgo yan mā piteva kitavaṃ śaśāsa /
analyzed: pra vaḥ ekaḥ mimaya bhūri āgaḥ yat mā pitā iva kitavam śaśāsa

original: RV_2,029.05c āre pāśā āre aghāni devā mā mādhi putre vim iva grabhīṣṭa //
analyzed: āre pāśāḥ āre aghāni devāḥ mā mā adhi putre vim iva grabhīṣṭa

original: RV_2,029.06a arvāñco adyā bhavatā yajatrā ā vo hārdi bhayamāno vyayeyam /
analyzed: arvāñcaḥ adya bhavata yajatrāḥ ā vaḥ hārdi bhayamānaḥ vyayeyam

original: RV_2,029.06c trādhvaṃ no devā nijuro vṛkasya trādhvaṃ kartād avapado yajatrāḥ //
analyzed: trādhvam naḥ devāḥ nijuraḥ vṛkasya trādhvam kartāt avapadaḥ yajatrāḥ

original: RV_2,029.07a māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ /
analyzed: mā aham maghonaḥ varuṇa priyasya bhūri dāvnaḥ ā vidam śūnam āpeḥ

original: RV_2,029.07c mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: mā rāyaḥ rājan su yamāt ava sthām bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,030.01a ṛtaṃ devāya kṛṇvate savitra indrāyāhighne na ramanta āpaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam devāya kṛṇvate savitre indrāya ahi ghne na ramante āpaḥ

original: RV_2,030.01c ahar-ahar yāty aktur apāṃ kiyāty ā prathamaḥ sarga āsām //
analyzed: ahar ahar yāti aktuḥ apām kiyāti ā prathamaḥ sargaḥ āsām

original: RV_2,030.02a yo vṛtrāya sinam atrābhariṣyat pra taṃ janitrī viduṣa uvāca /
analyzed: yaḥ vṛtrāya sinam atrā ābhariṣyat pra tam janitrī viduṣe uvāca

original: RV_2,030.02c patho radantīr anu joṣam asmai dive-dive dhunayo yanty artham //
analyzed: pathaḥ radantīḥ anu joṣam asmai dive dive dhunayaḥ yanti artham

original: RV_2,030.03a ūrdhvo hy asthād adhy antarikṣe 'dhā vṛtrāya pra vadhaṃ jabhāra /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ hi asthāt adhi antarikṣe dhāḥ vṛtrāya pra vadham jabhāra

original: RV_2,030.03c mihaṃ vasāna upa hīm adudrot tigmāyudho ajayac chatrum indraḥ //
analyzed: miham vasānaḥ upa hi īm adudrot tigma āyudhaḥ ajayat śatrum indraḥ

original: RV_2,030.04a bṛhaspate tapuṣāśneva vidhya vṛkadvaraso asurasya vīrān /
analyzed: bṛhaspate tapuṣā aśnā iva vidhya vṛkadvaraso asurasya vīrān

original: RV_2,030.04c yathā jaghantha dhṛṣatā purā cid evā jahi śatrum asmākam indra //
analyzed: yathā jaghantha dhṛṣatā purā cit eva jahi śatrum asmākam indra

original: RV_2,030.05a ava kṣipa divo aśmānam uccā yena śatrum mandasāno nijūrvāḥ /
analyzed: ava kṣipa divaḥ aśmānam uccā yena śatrum mandasānaḥ nijūrvāḥ

original: RV_2,030.05c tokasya sātau tanayasya bhūrer asmāṃ ardhaṃ kṛṇutād indra gonām //
analyzed: tokasya sātau tanayasya bhūreḥ asmān ardham kṛṇutāt indra gonām

original: RV_2,030.06a pra hi kratuṃ vṛhatho yaṃ vanutho radhrasya stho yajamānasya codau /
analyzed: pra hi kratum vṛhathaḥ yam vanuthaḥ radhrasya sthaḥ yajamānasya codau

original: RV_2,030.06c indrāsomā yuvam asmāṃ aviṣṭam asmin bhayasthe kṛṇutam u lokam //
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ yuvam asmām aviṣṭam asmin bhayasthe kṛṇutam u lokam

original: RV_2,030.07a na mā taman na śraman nota tandran na vocāma mā sunoteti somam /
analyzed: na mā taman na śraman na uta tandran na vocāma mā sunota iti somam

original: RV_2,030.07c yo me pṛṇād yo dadad yo nibodhād yo mā sunvantam upa gobhir āyat //
analyzed: yaḥ me pṛṇāt yaḥ dadat yaḥ nibodhāt yaḥ mā sunvantam upa gobhiḥ āyat

original: RV_2,030.08a sarasvati tvam asmāṃ aviḍḍhi marutvatī dhṛṣatī jeṣi śatrūn /
analyzed: sarasvati tvam asmām aviḍḍhi marutvatī dhṛṣatī jeṣi śatrūn

original: RV_2,030.08c tyaṃ cic chardhantaṃ taviṣīyamāṇam indro hanti vṛṣabhaṃ śaṇḍikānām //
analyzed: tyam cit śardhantam taviṣīyamāṇam indraḥ hanti vṛṣabham śaṇḍikānām

original: RV_2,030.09a yo naḥ sanutya uta vā jighatnur abhikhyāya taṃ tigitena vidhya /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ sanutyaḥ uta vā jighatnuḥ abhikhyāya tam tigitena vidhya

original: RV_2,030.09c bṛhaspata āyudhair jeṣi śatrūn druhe rīṣantam pari dhehi rājan //
analyzed: bṛhaspate āyudhaiḥ jeṣi śatrūn druhe rīṣantam pari dhehi rājan

original: RV_2,030.10a asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra śūrair vīryā kṛdhi yāni te kartvāni /
analyzed: asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra śūraiḥ vīryā kṛdhi yāni te kartvāni

original: RV_2,030.10c jyog abhūvann anudhūpitāso hatvī teṣām ā bharā no vasūni //
analyzed: jyok abhūvan anudhūpitāsaḥ hatvī teṣām ā bhara naḥ vasūni

original: RV_2,030.11a taṃ vaḥ śardham mārutaṃ sumnayur giropa bruve namasā daivyaṃ janam /
analyzed: tam vaḥ śardham mārutam sumnayuḥ girā upa bruve namasā daivyam janam

original: RV_2,030.11c yathā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ naśāmahā apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ dive-dive //
analyzed: yathā rayim sarva vīram naśāmahai apatyasācam śrutyam dive dive

original: RV_2,031.01a asmākam mitrāvaruṇāvataṃ ratham ādityai rudrair vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā /
analyzed: asmākam mitrāvaruṇā avatam ratham ādityaiḥ rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā

original: RV_2,031.01c pra yad vayo na paptan vasmanas pari śravasyavo hṛṣīvanto vanarṣadaḥ //
analyzed: pra yat vayaḥ na paptan vasmanaḥ pari śravasyavaḥ hṛṣīvantaḥ vanarṣadaḥ

original: RV_2,031.02a adha smā na ud avatā sajoṣaso rathaṃ devāso abhi vikṣu vājayum /
analyzed: adha smā naḥ ud avata sajoṣasaḥ ratham devāsaḥ abhi vikṣu vājayum

original: RV_2,031.02c yad āśavaḥ padyābhis titrato rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ sānau jaṅghananta pāṇibhiḥ //
analyzed: yat āśavaḥ padyābhiḥ titrataḥ rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ sānau jaṅghananta pāṇibhiḥ

original: RV_2,031.03a uta sya na indro viśvacarṣaṇir divaḥ śardhena mārutena sukratuḥ /
analyzed: uta sya naḥ indraḥ viśvacarṣaṇiḥ divaḥ śardhena mārutena su kratuḥ

original: RV_2,031.03c anu nu sthāty avṛkābhir ūtibhī ratham mahe sanaye vājasātaye //
analyzed: anu nu sthāti avṛkābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ ratham mahe sanaye vājasātaye

original: RV_2,031.04a uta sya devo bhuvanasya sakṣaṇis tvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ sajoṣā jūjuvad ratham /
analyzed: uta sya devaḥ bhuvanasya sakṣaṇiḥ tvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ jūjuvat ratham

original: RV_2,031.04c iḷā bhago bṛhaddivota rodasī pūṣā purandhir aśvināv adhā patī //
analyzed: iḷā bhagaḥ bṛhaddivā uta rodasī pūṣā purandhiḥ aśvinau adhā patī

original: RV_2,031.05a uta tye devī subhage mithūdṛśoṣāsānaktā jagatām apījuvā /
analyzed: uta tye devī subhage mithūdṛśā uṣāsānaktā jagatām

original: RV_2,031.05c stuṣe yad vām pṛthivi navyasā vaca sthātuś ca vayas trivayā upastire //
analyzed: stuṣe yat vām pṛthivi navyasā sthātuḥ ca vayaḥ trivayāḥ upastire

original: RV_2,031.06a uta vaḥ śaṃsam uśijām iva śmasy ahir budhnyo 'ja ekapād uta /
analyzed: uta vaḥ śaṃsam uśijām iva śmasi ahiḥ budhnyaḥ jaḥ ekapād uta

original: RV_2,031.06c trita ṛbhukṣāḥ savitā cano dadhe 'pāṃ napād āśuhemā dhiyā śami //
analyzed: tritaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ savitā canaḥ dadhe pām napāt āśu hemā dhiyā śami

original: RV_2,031.07a etā vo vaśmy udyatā yajatrā atakṣann āyavo navyase sam /
analyzed: etāḥ vaḥ vaśmi udyatāḥ yajatrāḥ atakṣan āyavaḥ navyase sam

original: RV_2,031.07c śravasyavo vājaṃ cakānāḥ saptir na rathyo aha dhītim aśyāḥ //
analyzed: śravasyavaḥ vājam cakānāḥ saptiḥ na rathyaḥ aha dhītim aśyāḥ

original: RV_2,032.01a asya me dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāyato bhūtam avitrī vacasaḥ siṣāsataḥ /
analyzed: asya me dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāyataḥ bhūtam avitrī vacasaḥ siṣāsataḥ

original: RV_2,032.01c yayor āyuḥ prataraṃ te idam pura upastute vasūyur vām maho dadhe //
analyzed: yayoḥ āyuḥ prataram te idam puras upastute vasūyuḥ vām mahaḥ dadhe

original: RV_2,032.02a mā no guhyā ripa āyor ahan dabhan mā na ābhyo rīradho ducchunābhyaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ guhyāḥ ripaḥ āyoḥ ahan dabhan mā naḥ ābhyaḥ rīradhaḥ ducchunābhyaḥ

original: RV_2,032.02c mā no vi yauḥ sakhyā viddhi tasya naḥ sumnāyatā manasā tat tvemahe //
analyzed: mā naḥ vi yauḥ sakhyā viddhi tasya naḥ sumnāyatā manasā tat tvā īmahe

original: RV_2,032.03a aheḷatā manasā śruṣṭim ā vaha duhānāṃ dhenum pipyuṣīm asaścatam /
analyzed: a heḍatā manasā śruṣṭim ā vaha duhānām dhenum pipyuṣīm asaścatam

original: RV_2,032.03c padyābhir āśuṃ vacasā ca vājinaṃ tvāṃ hinomi puruhūta viśvahā //
analyzed: padyābhiḥ āśum vacasā ca vājinam tvām hinomi puruhūta viśvahā

original: RV_2,032.04a rākām ahaṃ suhavāṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā /
analyzed: rākām aham su havām suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā

original: RV_2,032.04c sīvyatv apaḥ sūcyācchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ śatadāyam ukthyam //
analyzed: sīvyatu apaḥ sūcyā a chidyamānayā dadātu vīram śatadāyam ukthyam

original: RV_2,032.05a yās te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhir dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni /
analyzed: yāḥ te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśasaḥ yābhiḥ dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni

original: RV_2,032.05c tābhir no adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrapoṣaṃ subhage rarāṇā //
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ adya sumanāḥ upāgahi sahasra poṣam subhage rarāṇā

original: RV_2,032.06a sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā /
analyzed: sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā

original: RV_2,032.06c juṣasva havyam āhutam prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ //
analyzed: juṣasva havyam āhutam prajām devi didiḍḍhi naḥ

original: RV_2,032.07a yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ suṣūmā bahusūvarī /
analyzed: yā su bāhuḥ su aṅguriḥ suṣūmā bahusūvarī

original: RV_2,032.07c tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana //
analyzed: tasyai viś patnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana

original: RV_2,032.08a yā guṅgūr yā sinīvālī yā rākā yā sarasvatī /
analyzed: yā guṅgūḥ yā sinīvālī yā rākā yā sarasvatī

original: RV_2,032.08c indrāṇīm ahva ūtaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye //
analyzed: indrāṇīm ahve ūtaye varuṇānīm svastaye

original: RV_2,033.01a ā te pitar marutāṃ sumnam etu mā naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśo yuyothāḥ /
analyzed: ā te pitar marutām sumnam etu mā naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśaḥ yuyothāḥ

original: RV_2,033.01c abhi no vīro arvati kṣameta pra jāyemahi rudra prajābhiḥ //
analyzed: abhi naḥ vīraḥ arvati kṣameta pra jāyemahi rudra prajābhiḥ

original: RV_2,033.02a tvādattebhī rudra śantamebhiḥ śataṃ himā aśīya bheṣajebhiḥ /
analyzed: tvādattebhiḥ rudra śantamebhiḥ śatam himā aśīya bheṣajebhiḥ

original: RV_2,033.02c vy asmad dveṣo vitaraṃ vy aṃho vy amīvāś cātayasvā viṣūcīḥ //
analyzed: vi asmat dveṣaḥ vitaram vi aṃhaḥ vi amīvāḥ cātayasva viṣūcīḥ

original: RV_2,033.03a śreṣṭho jātasya rudra śriyāsi tavastamas tavasāṃ vajrabāho /
analyzed: śreṣṭhaḥ jātasya rudra śriyā asi tavastamaḥ tavasām vajra bāho

original: RV_2,033.03c parṣi ṇaḥ pāram aṃhasaḥ svasti viśvā abhītī rapaso yuyodhi //
analyzed: parṣi naḥ pāram aṃhasaḥ svasti viśvāḥ abhītīḥ rapasaḥ yuyodhi

original: RV_2,033.04a mā tvā rudra cukrudhāmā namobhir mā duṣṭutī vṛṣabha mā sahūtī /
analyzed: mā tvā rudra cukrudhāmā namobhiḥ mā duṣṭutī vṛṣabha mā sahūtī

original: RV_2,033.04c un no vīrāṃ arpaya bheṣajebhir bhiṣaktamaṃ tvā bhiṣajāṃ śṛṇomi //
analyzed: ud naḥ vīrān arpaya bheṣajebhiḥ bhiṣaktamam tvā bhiṣajām śṛṇomi

original: RV_2,033.05a havīmabhir havate yo havirbhir ava stomebhī rudraṃ diṣīya /
analyzed: havīmabhiḥ havate yaḥ havirbhiḥ ava stomebhiḥ rudram diṣīya

original: RV_2,033.05c ṛdūdaraḥ suhavo mā no asyai babhruḥ suśipro rīradhan manāyai //
analyzed: ṛdūdaraḥ su havaḥ mā naḥ asyai babhruḥ su śipraḥ rīradhat manāyai

original: RV_2,033.06a un mā mamanda vṛṣabho marutvān tvakṣīyasā vayasā nādhamānam /
analyzed: ud mā mamanda vṛṣabhaḥ marutvān tvakṣīyasā vayasā nādhamānam

original: RV_2,033.06c ghṛṇīva cchāyām arapā aśīyā vivāseyaṃ rudrasya sumnam //
analyzed: ghṛṇī iva chāyām arapāḥ aśīyāḥ vivāseyam rudrasya sumnam

original: RV_2,033.07a kva sya te rudra mṛḷayākur hasto yo asti bheṣajo jalāṣaḥ /
analyzed: kva sya te rudra mṛḍayākuḥ hastaḥ yaḥ asti bheṣajaḥ jalāṣaḥ

original: RV_2,033.07c apabhartā rapaso daivyasyābhī nu mā vṛṣabha cakṣamīthāḥ //
analyzed: apabhartā rapasaḥ daivyasya abhi nu mā vṛṣabha cakṣamīthāḥ

original: RV_2,033.08a pra babhrave vṛṣabhāya śvitīce maho mahīṃ suṣṭutim īrayāmi /
analyzed: pra babhrave vṛṣabhāya śvitīce mahaḥ mahīm suṣṭutim īrayāmi

original: RV_2,033.08c namasyā kalmalīkinaṃ namobhir gṛṇīmasi tveṣaṃ rudrasya nāma //
analyzed: namasya kalmalīkinam namobhiḥ gṛṇīmasi tveṣam rudrasya nāma

original: RV_2,033.09a sthirebhir aṅgaiḥ pururūpa ugro babhruḥ śukrebhiḥ pipiśe hiraṇyaiḥ /
analyzed: sthirebhiḥ aṅgaiḥ puru rūpaḥ ugraḥ babhruḥ śukrebhiḥ pipiśe hiraṇyaiḥ

original: RV_2,033.09c īśānād asya bhuvanasya bhūrer na vā u yoṣad rudrād asuryam //
analyzed: īśānāt asya bhuvanasya bhūreḥ na vai u yoṣat rudrāt asuryam

original: RV_2,033.10a arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanvārhan niṣkaṃ yajataṃ viśvarūpam /
analyzed: arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanvā arhan niṣkam yajatam viśva rūpam

original: RV_2,033.10c arhann idaṃ dayase viśvam abhvaṃ na vā ojīyo rudra tvad asti //
analyzed: arhan idam dayase viśvam abhvam na vai ojīyaḥ rudra tvat asti

original: RV_2,033.11a stuhi śrutaṃ gartasadaṃ yuvānam mṛgaṃ na bhīmam upahatnum ugram /
analyzed: stuhi śrutam garta sadam yuvānam mṛgam na bhīmam upahatnum ugram

original: RV_2,033.11c mṛḷā jaritre rudra stavāno 'nyaṃ te asman ni vapantu senāḥ //
analyzed: mṛḷa jaritre rudra stavānaḥ nyam te asmat ni vapantu senāḥ

original: RV_2,033.12a kumāraś cit pitaraṃ vandamānam prati nānāma rudropayantam /
analyzed: kumāraḥ cit pitaram vandamānam prati nānāma rudra upayantam

original: RV_2,033.12c bhūrer dātāraṃ satpatiṃ gṛṇīṣe stutas tvam bheṣajā rāsy asme //
analyzed: bhūreḥ dātāram sat patim gṛṇīṣe stutaḥ tvam bheṣajā rāsi asme

original: RV_2,033.13a yā vo bheṣajā marutaḥ śucīni yā śantamā vṛṣaṇo yā mayobhu /
analyzed: yā vaḥ bheṣajā marutaḥ śucīni yā śantamā vṛṣaṇaḥ yā mayobhu

original: RV_2,033.13c yāni manur avṛṇītā pitā nas tā śaṃ ca yoś ca rudrasya vaśmi //
analyzed: yāni manuḥ avṛṇīta ā pitā naḥ tā śam ca yoḥ ca rudrasya vaśmi

original: RV_2,033.14a pari ṇo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ pari tveṣasya durmatir mahī gāt /
analyzed: pari naḥ hetiḥ rudrasya vṛjyāḥ pari tveṣasya durmatiḥ mahī gāt

original: RV_2,033.14c ava sthirā maghavadbhyas tanuṣva mīḍhvas tokāya tanayāya mṛḷa //
analyzed: ava sthirā maghavadbhyaḥ tanuṣva mīḍhvaḥ tokāya tanayāya mṛḍa

original: RV_2,033.15a evā babhro vṛṣabha cekitāna yathā deva na hṛṇīṣe na haṃsi /
analyzed: eva babhro vṛṣabha cekitāna yathā deva na hṛṇīṣe na haṃsi

original: RV_2,033.15c havanaśrun no rudreha bodhi bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: havana śrut naḥ rudra iha bodhi bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,034.01a dhārāvarā maruto dhṛṣṇvojaso mṛgā na bhīmās taviṣībhir arcinaḥ /
analyzed: dhārā varāḥ marutaḥ dhṛṣṇu ojasaḥ mṛgāḥ na bhīmāḥ taviṣībhiḥ arcinaḥ

original: RV_2,034.01c agnayo na śuśucānā ṛjīṣiṇo bhṛmiṃ dhamanto apa gā avṛṇvata //
analyzed: agnayaḥ na śuśucānāḥ ṛjīṣiṇaḥ bhṛmim dhamantaḥ apa gāḥ avṛṇvata

original: RV_2,034.02a dyāvo na stṛbhiś citayanta khādino vy abhriyā na dyutayanta vṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: dyāvaḥ na stṛbhiḥ citayanta khādinaḥ vi abhriyāḥ na dyutayanta vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_2,034.02c rudro yad vo maruto rukmavakṣaso vṛṣājani pṛśnyāḥ śukra ūdhani //
analyzed: rudraḥ yat vaḥ marutaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ vṛṣā ajani pṛśnyāḥ śukre ūdhani

original: RV_2,034.03a ukṣante aśvāṃ atyāṃ ivājiṣu nadasya karṇais turayanta āśubhiḥ /
analyzed: ukṣante aśvān atyān iva ājiṣu nadasya karṇaiḥ turayantaḥ āśubhiḥ

original: RV_2,034.03c hiraṇyaśiprā maruto davidhvataḥ pṛkṣaṃ yātha pṛṣatībhiḥ samanyavaḥ //
analyzed: hiraṇya śiprāḥ marutaḥ davidhvataḥ pṛkṣam yātha pṛṣatībhiḥ samanyavaḥ

original: RV_2,034.04a pṛkṣe tā viśvā bhuvanā vavakṣire mitrāya vā sadam ā jīradānavaḥ /
analyzed: pṛkṣe tā viśvā bhuvanā vavakṣire mitrāya vā sadam ā jīra dānavaḥ

original: RV_2,034.04c pṛṣadaśvāso anavabhrarādhasa ṛjipyāso na vayuneṣu dhūrṣadaḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣat aśvāsaḥ anavabhra rādhasaḥ ṛjipyāsaḥ na vayuneṣu dhūrṣadaḥ

original: RV_2,034.05a indhanvabhir dhenubhī rapśadūdhabhir adhvasmabhiḥ pathibhir bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: indhanvabhiḥ dhenubhiḥ rapśa dūdhabhiḥ adhvasmabhiḥ pathibhiḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_2,034.05c ā haṃsāso na svasarāṇi gantana madhor madāya marutaḥ samanyavaḥ //
analyzed: ā haṃsāsaḥ na svasarāṇi gantana madhoḥ madāya marutaḥ samanyavaḥ

original: RV_2,034.06a ā no brahmāṇi marutaḥ samanyavo narāṃ na śaṃsaḥ savanāni gantana /
analyzed: ā naḥ brahmāṇi marutaḥ samanyavaḥ narām na śaṃsaḥ savanāni gantana

original: RV_2,034.06c aśvām iva pipyata dhenum ūdhani kartā dhiyaṃ jaritre vājapeśasam //
analyzed: aśvām iva pipyata dhenum ūdhani karta dhiyam jaritre vāja peśasam

original: RV_2,034.07a taṃ no dāta maruto vājinaṃ ratha āpānam brahma citayad dive-dive /
analyzed: tam naḥ dāta marutaḥ vājinam rathe āpānam brahma citayat dive dive

original: RV_2,034.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo vṛjaneṣu kārave sanim medhām ariṣṭaṃ duṣṭaraṃ sahaḥ //
analyzed: iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ vṛjaneṣu kārave sanim medhām ariṣṭam duṣṭaram sahaḥ

original: RV_2,034.08a yad yuñjate maruto rukmavakṣaso 'śvān ratheṣu bhaga ā sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: yat yuñjate marutaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ śvān ratheṣu bhagaḥ ā sudānavaḥ

original: RV_2,034.08c dhenur na śiśve svasareṣu pinvate janāya rātahaviṣe mahīm iṣam //
analyzed: dhenuḥ na śiśve svasareṣu pinvate janāya rāta haviṣe mahīm iṣam

original: RV_2,034.09a yo no maruto vṛkatāti martyo ripur dadhe vasavo rakṣatā riṣaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ marutaḥ vṛkatāti martyaḥ ripuḥ dadhe vasavaḥ rakṣatā riṣaḥ

original: RV_2,034.09c vartayata tapuṣā cakriyābhi tam ava rudrā aśaso hantanā vadhaḥ //
analyzed: vartayata tapuṣā cakriyā abhi tam ava rudrāḥ aśasaḥ hantana vadhaḥ

original: RV_2,034.10a citraṃ tad vo maruto yāma cekite pṛśnyā yad ūdhar apy āpayo duhuḥ /
analyzed: citram tat vaḥ marutaḥ yāma cekite pṛśnyāḥ yat ūdhar api āpayaḥ duhuḥ

original: RV_2,034.10c yad vā nide navamānasya rudriyās tritaṃ jarāya juratām adābhyāḥ //
analyzed: yat vā nide navamānasya rudriyāḥ tritam jarāya juratām adābhyāḥ

original: RV_2,034.11a tān vo maho maruta evayāvno viṣṇor eṣasya prabhṛthe havāmahe /
analyzed: tān vaḥ mahaḥ marutaḥ eva yāvnaḥ viṣṇoḥ eṣasya prabhṛthe havāmahe

original: RV_2,034.11c hiraṇyavarṇān kakuhān yatasruco brahmaṇyantaḥ śaṃsyaṃ rādha īmahe //
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇān kakuhān yata srucaḥ brahmaṇyantaḥ śaṃsyam rādhaḥ īmahe

original: RV_2,034.12a te daśagvāḥ prathamā yajñam ūhire te no hinvantūṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: te daśagvāḥ prathamāḥ yajñam ūhire te naḥ hinvantu uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_2,034.12c uṣā na rāmīr aruṇair aporṇute maho jyotiṣā śucatā goarṇasā //
analyzed: uṣāḥ na rāmīḥ aruṇaiḥ aporṇute mahaḥ jyotiṣā śucatā go arṇasā

original: RV_2,034.13a te kṣoṇībhir aruṇebhir nāñjibhī rudrā ṛtasya sadaneṣu vāvṛdhuḥ /
analyzed: te kṣoṇībhiḥ aruṇebhiḥ nāñjibhiḥ rudrāḥ ṛtasya sadaneṣu vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_2,034.13c nimeghamānā atyena pājasā suścandraṃ varṇaṃ dadhire supeśasam //
analyzed: nimeghamānāḥ atyena pājasā su ścandram varṇam dadhire supeśasam

original: RV_2,034.14a tāṃ iyāno mahi varūtham ūtaya upa ghed enā namasā gṛṇīmasi /
analyzed: tām iyānaḥ mahi varūtham ūtaye upa gha id enā namasā gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_2,034.14c trito na yān pañca hotṝn abhiṣṭaya āvavartad avarāñ cakriyāvase //
analyzed: tritaḥ na yān pañca hotṝn abhiṣṭayaḥ āvavartat avarām

original: RV_2,034.15a yayā radhram pārayathāty aṃho yayā nido muñcatha vanditāram /
analyzed: yayā radhram pārayatha ati aṃhaḥ yayā nidaḥ muñcatha vanditāram

original: RV_2,034.15c arvācī sā maruto yā va ūtir o ṣu vāśreva sumatir jigātu //
analyzed: arvācī sā marutaḥ yā vaḥ ūtiḥ ā u su vāśrā iva sumatiḥ jigātu

original: RV_2,035.01a upem asṛkṣi vājayur vacasyāṃ cano dadhīta nādyo giro me /
analyzed: upa īm asṛkṣi vājayuḥ vacasyām canaḥ dadhīta na adyaḥ giraḥ me

original: RV_2,035.01c apāṃ napād āśuhemā kuvit sa supeśasas karati joṣiṣad dhi //
analyzed: apām napāt āśu hemā kuvid sa supeśasaḥ karati joṣiṣat hi

original: RV_2,035.02a imaṃ sv asmai hṛda ā sutaṣṭam mantraṃ vocema kuvid asya vedat /
analyzed: imam su asmai hṛde ā su taṣṭam mantram vocema kuvid asya vedat

original: RV_2,035.02c apāṃ napād asuryasya mahnā viśvāny aryo bhuvanā jajāna //
analyzed: apām napāt asuryasya mahnā viśvāni aryaḥ bhuvanā jajāna

original: RV_2,035.03a sam anyā yanty upa yanty anyāḥ samānam ūrvaṃ nadyaḥ pṛṇanti /
analyzed: sam anyāḥ yanti upa yanti anyāḥ samānam ūrvam nadyaḥ pṛṇanti

original: RV_2,035.03c tam ū śuciṃ śucayo dīdivāṃsam apāṃ napātam pari tasthur āpaḥ //
analyzed: tam ū śucim śucayaḥ dīdivāṃsam apām napātam pari tasthuḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_2,035.04a tam asmerā yuvatayo yuvānam marmṛjyamānāḥ pari yanty āpaḥ /
analyzed: tam asmerāḥ yuvatayaḥ yuvānam marmṛjyamānāḥ pari yanti āpaḥ

original: RV_2,035.04c sa śukrebhiḥ śikvabhī revad asme dīdāyānidhmo ghṛtanirṇig apsu //
analyzed: sa śukrebhiḥ śikvabhiḥ revat asme dīdāya a nidhmaḥ ghṛta nirṇij apsu

original: RV_2,035.05a asmai tisro avyathyāya nārīr devāya devīr didhiṣanty annam /
analyzed: asmai tisraḥ avyathyāya nārīḥ devāya devīḥ didhiṣanti annam

original: RV_2,035.05c kṛtā ivopa hi prasarsre apsu sa pīyūṣaṃ dhayati pūrvasūnām //
analyzed: kṛtāḥ iva upa hi prasarsre apsu sa pīyūṣam dhayati pūrvasūnām

original: RV_2,035.06a aśvasyātra janimāsya ca svar druho riṣaḥ sampṛcaḥ pāhi sūrīn /
analyzed: aśvasya atra janima asya ca svar druhaḥ riṣaḥ sampṛcaḥ pāhi sūrīn

original: RV_2,035.06c āmāsu pūrṣu paro apramṛṣyaṃ nārātayo vi naśan nānṛtāni //
analyzed: āmāsu pūrṣu paras apramṛṣyam na arātayaḥ vi naśan na anṛtāni

original: RV_2,035.07a sva ā dame sudughā yasya dhenuḥ svadhām pīpāya subhv annam atti /
analyzed: sve ā dame sudughā yasya dhenuḥ svadhām pīpāya subhu annam atti

original: RV_2,035.07c so apāṃ napād ūrjayann apsv antar vasudeyāya vidhate vi bhāti //
analyzed: saḥ apām napāt ūrjayan apsu antar vasu deyāya vidhate vi bhāti

original: RV_2,035.08a yo apsv ā śucinā daivyena ṛtāvājasra urviyā vibhāti /
analyzed: yaḥ apsu ā śucinā daivyena ṛtāvā ajasraḥ urviyā vibhāti

original: RV_2,035.08c vayā id anyā bhuvanāny asya pra jāyante vīrudhaś ca prajābhiḥ //
analyzed: vayāḥ id anyā bhuvanāni asya pra jāyante vīrudhaḥ ca prajābhiḥ

original: RV_2,035.09a apāṃ napād ā hy asthād upasthaṃ jihmānām ūrdhvo vidyutaṃ vasānaḥ /
analyzed: apām napāt ā hi asthāt upastham jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ vidyutam vasānaḥ

original: RV_2,035.09c tasya jyeṣṭham mahimānaṃ vahantīr hiraṇyavarṇāḥ pari yanti yahvīḥ //
analyzed: tasya jyeṣṭham mahimānam vahantīḥ hiraṇya varṇāḥ pari yanti yahvīḥ

original: RV_2,035.10a hiraṇyarūpaḥ sa hiraṇyasaṃdṛg apāṃ napāt sed u hiraṇyavarṇaḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpaḥ sa hiraṇya saṃdṛś apām napāt sa id u hiraṇya varṇaḥ

original: RV_2,035.10c hiraṇyayāt pari yoner niṣadyā hiraṇyadā dadaty annam asmai //
analyzed: hiraṇyayāt pari yoneḥ niṣadyā hiraṇya dāḥ dadati annam asmai

original: RV_2,035.11a tad asyānīkam uta cāru nāmāpīcyaṃ vardhate naptur apām /
analyzed: tat asya anīkam uta cāru nāma āpīcyam vardhate naptuḥ apām

original: RV_2,035.11c yam indhate yuvatayaḥ sam itthā hiraṇyavarṇaṃ ghṛtam annam asya //
analyzed: yam indhate yuvatayaḥ sam itthā hiraṇya varṇam ghṛtam annam asya

original: RV_2,035.12a asmai bahūnām avamāya sakhye yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ /
analyzed: asmai bahūnām avamāya sakhye yajñaiḥ vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ

original: RV_2,035.12c saṃ sānu mārjmi didhiṣāmi bilmair dadhāmy annaiḥ pari vanda ṛgbhiḥ //
analyzed: sam sānu mārjmi didhiṣāmi bilmaiḥ dadhāmi annaiḥ pari vande ṛgbhiḥ

original: RV_2,035.13a sa īṃ vṛṣājanayat tāsu garbhaṃ sa īṃ śiśur dhayati taṃ rihanti /
analyzed: saḥ īm vṛṣā ajanayat tāsu garbham saḥ īm śiśuḥ dhayati tam rihanti

original: RV_2,035.13c so apāṃ napād anabhimlātavarṇo 'nyasyeveha tanvā viveṣa //
analyzed: saḥ apām napāt an abhimlāta varṇaḥ nyasya iva iha tanvā viveṣa

original: RV_2,035.14a asmin pade parame tasthivāṃsam adhvasmabhir viśvahā dīdivāṃsam /
analyzed: asmin pade parame tasthivāṃsam adhvasmabhiḥ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam

original: RV_2,035.14c āpo naptre ghṛtam annaṃ vahantīḥ svayam atkaiḥ pari dīyanti yahvīḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ naptre ghṛtam annam vahantīḥ svayam atkaiḥ pari dīyanti yahvīḥ

original: RV_2,035.15a ayāṃsam agne sukṣitiṃ janāyāyāṃsam u maghavadbhyaḥ suvṛktim /
analyzed: ayāṃsam agne su kṣitim janāya ayāṃsam u maghavadbhyaḥ suvṛktim

original: RV_2,035.15c viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: viśvam tat bhadram yat avanti devāḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,036.01a tubhyaṃ hinvāno vasiṣṭa gā apo 'dhukṣan sīm avibhir adribhir naraḥ /
analyzed: tubhyam hinvānaḥ vasiṣṭa gāḥ apaḥ dhukṣan sīm avibhiḥ adribhiḥ naraḥ

original: RV_2,036.01c pibendra svāhā prahutaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ hotrād ā somam prathamo ya īśiṣe //
analyzed: piba indra svāhā prahutam vaṣaṭkṛtam hotrāt ā somam prathamaḥ yaḥ īśiṣe

original: RV_2,036.02a yajñaiḥ sammiślāḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhir yāmañ chubhrāso añjiṣu priyā uta /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ sammiślāḥ pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ yāmam śubhrāsaḥ añjiṣu priyāḥ uta

original: RV_2,036.02c āsadyā barhir bharatasya sūnavaḥ potrād ā somam pibatā divo naraḥ //
analyzed: āsadya barhiḥ bharatasya sūnavaḥ potrāt ā somam pibata divaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_2,036.03a ameva naḥ suhavā ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatanā raṇiṣṭana /
analyzed: amā iva naḥ su havāḥ ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatana raṇiṣṭana

analyzed: athā mandasva jujuṣāṇaḥ andhasaḥ tvaṣṭar devebhiḥ janibhiḥ sumat gaṇaḥ

analyzed: ā vakṣi devān iha vipra yakṣi ca uśan hotar ni sadā yoniṣu triṣu

analyzed: prati vīhi prasthitam somyam madhu piba āgnīdhrāt tava bhāgasya tṛpṇuhi

analyzed: eṣa sya te tanvaḥ nṛmṇa vardhanaḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ pradivi bāhvoḥ hitaḥ

analyzed: tubhyam sutaḥ maghavan tubhyam ābhṛtaḥ tvam asya brāhmaṇāt ā tṛpat piba

analyzed: juṣethām yajñam bodhatam havasya me sattaḥ hotā nividaḥ pūrvyāḥ anu

analyzed: acchā rājānā namaḥ eti āvṛtam praśāstrāt ā pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_2,037.01a mandasva hotrād anu joṣam andhaso 'dhvaryavaḥ sa pūrṇāṃ vaṣṭy āsicam /
analyzed: mandasva hotrāt anu joṣam andhasaḥ dhvaryavaḥ sa pūrṇām vaṣṭi āsicam

original: RV_2,037.01c tasmā etam bharata tadvaśo dadir hotrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ //
analyzed: tasmai etam bharata tad vaśaḥ dadiḥ hotrāt somam draviṇaḥ daḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ

original: RV_2,037.02a yam u pūrvam ahuve tam idaṃ huve sed u havyo dadir yo nāma patyate /
analyzed: yam u pūrvam ahuve tam idam huve sa id u havyaḥ dadiḥ yaḥ nāma patyate

original: RV_2,037.02c adhvaryubhiḥ prasthitaṃ somyam madhu potrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ //
analyzed: adhvaryubhiḥ prasthitam somyam madhu potrāt somam draviṇaḥ daḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ

original: RV_2,037.03a medyantu te vahnayo yebhir īyase 'riṣaṇyan vīḷayasvā vanaspate /
analyzed: medyantu te vahnayaḥ yebhiḥ īyase riṣaṇyan vīḍayasva vanaspate

original: RV_2,037.03c āyūyā dhṛṣṇo abhigūryā tvaṃ neṣṭrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ //
analyzed: āyūya dhṛṣṇo abhigūrya tvam neṣṭrāt somam draviṇaḥ daḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ

original: RV_2,037.04a apād dhotrād uta potrād amattota neṣṭrād ajuṣata prayo hitam /
analyzed: apāt hotrāt uta potrāt amatta uta neṣṭrāt ajuṣata prayaḥ hitam

original: RV_2,037.04c turīyam pātram amṛktam amartyaṃ draviṇodāḥ pibatu drāviṇodasaḥ //
analyzed: turīyam pātram amṛktam amartyam draviṇaḥ dāḥ pibatu drāviṇodasaḥ

original: RV_2,037.05a arvāñcam adya yayyaṃ nṛvāhaṇaṃ rathaṃ yuñjāthām iha vāṃ vimocanam /
analyzed: arvāñcam adya yayyam nṛvāhaṇam ratham yuñjāthām iha vām vimocanam

original: RV_2,037.05c pṛṅktaṃ havīṃṣi madhunā hi kaṃ gatam athā somam pibataṃ vājinīvasū //
analyzed: pṛṅktam havīṃṣi madhunā hi kam gatam athā somam pibatam vājinīvasū

original: RV_2,037.06a joṣy agne samidhaṃ joṣy āhutiṃ joṣi brahma janyaṃ joṣi suṣṭutim /
analyzed: joṣi agne samidham joṣi āhutim joṣi brahma janyam joṣi suṣṭutim

original: RV_2,037.06c viśvebhir viśvāṃ ṛtunā vaso maha uśan devāṃ uśataḥ pāyayā haviḥ //
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ viśvān ṛtunā vaso mahaḥ uśan devān uśataḥ pāyaya haviḥ

original: RV_2,038.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā savāya śaśvattamaṃ tadapā vahnir asthāt /
analyzed: ud u sya devaḥ savitā savāya śaśvattamam tad apāḥ vahniḥ asthāt

original: RV_2,038.01c nūnaṃ devebhyo vi hi dhāti ratnam athābhajad vītihotraṃ svastau //
analyzed: nūnam devebhyaḥ vi hi dhāti ratnam athā abhajat vītihotram svastau

analyzed: viśvasya hi śruṣṭaye devaḥ ūrdhvaḥ pra bāhū ā pṛthu pāṇiḥ sisarti

original: RV_2,038.02c āpaś cid asya vrata ā nimṛgrā ayaṃ cid vāto ramate parijman //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asya vrate ā nimṛgrāḥ ayam cit vātaḥ ramate parijman

original: RV_2,038.03a āśubhiś cid yān vi mucāti nūnam arīramad atamānaṃ cid etoḥ /
analyzed: āśubhiḥ cit yān vi mucāti nūnam arīramat atamānam cit etoḥ

original: RV_2,038.03c ahyarṣūṇāṃ cin ny ayāṃ aviṣyām anu vrataṃ savitur moky āgāt //
analyzed: ahyarṣūṇām cit ni ayām aviṣyām anu vratam savituḥ mokī āgāt

original: RV_2,038.04a punaḥ sam avyad vitataṃ vayantī madhyā kartor ny adhāc chakma dhīraḥ /
analyzed: punar sam avyat vitatam vayantī madhyā kartoḥ ni adhāt śakma dhīraḥ

analyzed: ud saṃhāya asthāt vi ṛtūṃr adardhar aramatiḥ savitā devaḥ āgāt

original: RV_2,038.05a nānaukāṃsi duryo viśvam āyur vi tiṣṭhate prabhavaḥ śoko agneḥ /
analyzed: nānā okāṃsi duryaḥ viśvam āyuḥ vi tiṣṭhate prabhavaḥ śokaḥ agneḥ

analyzed: jyeṣṭham mātā sūnave bhāgam ādhāt anu asya ketam iṣitam savitrā

original: RV_2,038.06a samāvavarti viṣṭhito jigīṣur viśveṣāṃ kāmaś caratām amābhūt /
analyzed: samāvavarti viṣṭhitaḥ jigīṣuḥ viśveṣām kāmaḥ caratām amā abhūt

analyzed: śaśvān apaḥ vikṛtam hitvī āgāt anu vratam savituḥ daivyasya

original: RV_2,038.07a tvayā hitam apyam apsu bhāgaṃ dhanvānv ā mṛgayaso vi tasthuḥ /
analyzed: tvayā hitam apyam apsu bhāgam dhanva anu ā mṛgayasaḥ vi tasthuḥ

original: RV_2,038.07c vanāni vibhyo nakir asya tāni vratā devasya savitur minanti //
analyzed: vanāni vibhyaḥ nakir asya tāni vratā devasya savituḥ minanti

original: RV_2,038.08a yādrādhyaṃ varuṇo yonim apyam aniśitaṃ nimiṣi jarbhurāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yādrādhyam varuṇaḥ yonim apyam aniśitam nimiṣi jarbhurāṇaḥ

original: RV_2,038.08c viśvo mārtāṇḍo vrajam ā paśur gāt sthaśo janmāni savitā vy ākaḥ //
analyzed: viśvaḥ mārtāṇḍaḥ vrajam ā paśuḥ gāt sthaśas janmāni savitā vi ākaḥ

original: RV_2,038.09a na yasyendro varuṇo na mitro vratam aryamā na minanti rudraḥ /
analyzed: na yasya indraḥ varuṇaḥ na mitraḥ vratam aryamā na minanti rudraḥ

original: RV_2,038.09c nārātayas tam idaṃ svasti huve devaṃ savitāraṃ namobhiḥ //
analyzed: na arātayaḥ tam idam svasti huve devam savitāram namobhiḥ

original: RV_2,038.10a bhagaṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantaḥ purandhiṃ narāśaṃso gnāspatir no avyāḥ /
analyzed: bhagam dhiyam vājayantaḥ purandhim narāśaṃsaḥ gnāspatiḥ naḥ avyāḥ

original: RV_2,038.10c āye vāmasya saṃgathe rayīṇām priyā devasya savituḥ syāma //
analyzed: āye vāmasya saṃgathe rayīṇām priyāḥ devasya savituḥ syāma

original: RV_2,038.11a asmabhyaṃ tad divo adbhyaḥ pṛthivyās tvayā dattaṃ kāmyaṃ rādha ā gāt /
analyzed: asmabhyam tat divaḥ adbhyaḥ pṛthivyāḥ tvayā dattam kāmyam rādhaḥ ā gāt

analyzed: śam yat stotṛbhyaḥ āpaye bhavāti uru śaṃsāya savitar jaritre

analyzed: grāvāṇā iva tat id artham jarethe gṛdhrā iva vṛkṣam nidhimantam accha

analyzed: brahmāṇā iva vidathe uktha śāsā dūtā iva havyā janyā purutrā

analyzed: prātaryāvāṇā rathyā iva vīrājā iva yamā varam ā sacethe

original: RV_2,039.02c mene iva tanvā śumbhamāne dampatīva kratuvidā janeṣu //
analyzed: mene iva tanvā śumbhamāne dampatī iva kratu vidā janeṣu

original: RV_2,039.03a śṛṅgeva naḥ prathamā gantam arvāk chaphāv iva jarbhurāṇā tarobhiḥ /
analyzed: śṛṅgā iva naḥ prathamā gantam arvāk śaphau iva jarbhurāṇā tarobhiḥ

analyzed: cakravākā iva prati vastoḥ usrā arvāñcā yātam rathyā iva śakrā

analyzed: nāvā iva naḥ pārayatam yugā iva nabhyā iva naḥ upadhī iva pradhī iva

analyzed: śvānā iva naḥ ariṣaṇyā tanūnām khṛgalā iva visrasaḥ pātam asmān

analyzed: vātā iva ajuryā nadyā iva rītiḥ akṣī iva cakṣuṣā yātam arvāk

analyzed: hastau iva tanve śambhaviṣṭhā pādā iva naḥ nayatam vasyaḥ accha

analyzed: oṣṭhau iva madhū āsne vadantā stanau iva pipyatam jīvase naḥ

analyzed: nāsā iva naḥ tanvaḥ rakṣitārā karṇau iva su śrutā bhūtam asme

analyzed: hastā iva śaktim abhi saṃdadī naḥ kṣāmā iva naḥ sam ajatam rajāṃsi

analyzed: imāḥ giraḥ aśvinā yuṣmayantīḥ kṣṇotreṇa iva svadhitim sam śiśītam

analyzed: etāni vām aśvinā vardhanāni brahma stomam gṛtsamadāsaḥ akran

analyzed: tāni narā jujuṣāṇā upa yātam bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

analyzed: somāpūṣaṇā jananā rayīṇām jananā divaḥ jananā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_2,040.01c jātau viśvasya bhuvanasya gopau devā akṛṇvann amṛtasya nābhim //
analyzed: jātau viśvasya bhuvanasya gopau devāḥ akṛṇvan amṛtasya nābhim

original: RV_2,040.02a imau devau jāyamānau juṣantemau tamāṃsi gūhatām ajuṣṭā /
analyzed: imau devau jāyamānau juṣanta imau tamāṃsi gūhatām ajuṣṭā

analyzed: ābhyām indraḥ pakvam āmāsu antar somāpūṣabhyām janat usriyāsu

original: RV_2,040.03a somāpūṣaṇā rajaso vimānaṃ saptacakraṃ ratham aviśvaminvam /
analyzed: somāpūṣaṇā rajasaḥ vimānam sapta cakram ratham a viśvaminvam

analyzed: viṣūvṛtam manasā yujyamānam tam jinvathaḥ vṛṣaṇā pañca raśmim

original: RV_2,040.04a divy anyaḥ sadanaṃ cakra uccā pṛthivyām anyo adhy antarikṣe /
analyzed: divi anyaḥ sadanam cakre uccā pṛthivyām anyaḥ adhi antarikṣe

original: RV_2,040.04c tāv asmabhyam puruvāram purukṣuṃ rāyas poṣaṃ vi ṣyatāṃ nābhim asme //
analyzed: tau asmabhyam puru vāram purukṣum rāyaḥ poṣam vi syatām nābhim asme

original: RV_2,040.05a viśvāny anyo bhuvanā jajāna viśvam anyo abhicakṣāṇa eti /
analyzed: viśvāni anyaḥ bhuvanā jajāna viśvam anyaḥ abhicakṣāṇaḥ eti

original: RV_2,040.05c somāpūṣaṇāv avataṃ dhiyam me yuvābhyāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayema //
analyzed: somāpūṣaṇau avatam dhiyam me yuvābhyām viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayema

original: RV_2,040.06a dhiyam pūṣā jinvatu viśvaminvo rayiṃ somo rayipatir dadhātu /
analyzed: dhiyam pūṣā jinvatu viśvaminvaḥ rayim somaḥ rayi patiḥ dadhātu

analyzed: avatu devī aditiḥ anarvā bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_2,041.01a vāyo ye te sahasriṇo rathāsas tebhir ā gahi /
analyzed: vāyo ye te sahasriṇaḥ rathāsaḥ tebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_2,041.01c niyutvān somapītaye //
analyzed: niyutvān soma pītaye

original: RV_2,041.02a niyutvān vāyav ā gahy ayaṃ śukro ayāmi te /
analyzed: niyutvān vāyo ā gahi ayam śukraḥ ayāmi te

original: RV_2,041.02c gantāsi sunvato gṛham //
analyzed: gantāsi sunvataḥ gṛham

original: RV_2,041.03a śukrasyādya gavāśira indravāyū niyutvataḥ /
analyzed: śukrasya adya gavāśiraḥ indra vāyū niyutvataḥ

original: RV_2,041.03c ā yātam pibataṃ narā //
analyzed: ā yātam pibatam narā

original: RV_2,041.04a ayaṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā /
analyzed: ayam vām mitrāvaruṇā sutaḥ somaḥ ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_2,041.04c mamed iha śrutaṃ havam //
analyzed: mama id iha śrutam havam

original: RV_2,041.05a rājānāv anabhidruhā dhruve sadasy uttame /
analyzed: rājānau an abhidruhā dhruve sadasi uttame

original: RV_2,041.05c sahasrasthūṇa āsāte //
analyzed: sahasra sthūṇe āsāte

original: RV_2,041.06a tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī ādityā dānunas patī /
analyzed: tā samrājā ghṛta āsutī ādityā dānunas patī

original: RV_2,041.06c sacete anavahvaram //
analyzed: sacete anavahvaram

original: RV_2,041.07a gomad ū ṣu nāsatyāśvāvad yātam aśvinā /
analyzed: gomat ū su nāsatyā aśvāvat yātam aśvinā

original: RV_2,041.07c vartī rudrā nṛpāyyam //
analyzed: vartiḥ rudrāḥ nṛpāyyam

original: RV_2,041.08a na yat paro nāntara ādadharṣad vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: na yat paras na antare ādadharṣat vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_2,041.08c duḥśaṃso martyo ripuḥ //
analyzed: duḥśaṃsaḥ martyaḥ ripuḥ

original: RV_2,041.09a tā na ā voḷham aśvinā rayim piśaṅgasaṃdṛśam /
analyzed: tā naḥ ā voḷham aśvinā rayim piśaṅga saṃdṛśam

original: RV_2,041.09c dhiṣṇyā varivovidam //
analyzed: dhiṣṇyā varivaḥ vidam

original: RV_2,041.10a indro aṅga mahad bhayam abhī ṣad apa cucyavat /
analyzed: indraḥ aṅga mahat bhayam abhī sat apa cucyavat

original: RV_2,041.10c sa hi sthiro vicarṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: sa hi sthiraḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_2,041.11a indraś ca mṛḷayāti no na naḥ paścād aghaṃ naśat /
analyzed: indraḥ ca mṛḍayāti naḥ na naḥ paścāt agham naśat

original: RV_2,041.11c bhadram bhavāti naḥ puraḥ //
analyzed: bhadram bhavāti naḥ puras

original: RV_2,041.12a indra āśābhyas pari sarvābhyo abhayaṃ karat /
analyzed: indraḥ āśābhyaḥ pari sarvābhyaḥ abhayam karat

original: RV_2,041.12c jetā śatrūn vicarṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: jetā śatrūn vicarṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_2,041.13a viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam /
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ ā gata śṛṇutā me imam havam

original: RV_2,041.13c edam barhir ni ṣīdata //
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ ni sīdata

original: RV_2,041.14a tīvro vo madhumāṃ ayaṃ śunahotreṣu matsaraḥ /
analyzed: tīvraḥ vaḥ madhumān ayam śunahotreṣu matsaraḥ

original: RV_2,041.14c etam pibata kāmyam //
analyzed: etam pibata kāmyam

original: RV_2,041.15a indrajyeṣṭhā marudgaṇā devāsaḥ pūṣarātayaḥ /
analyzed: indra jyeṣṭhāḥ marut gaṇāḥ devāsaḥ pūṣa rātayaḥ

original: RV_2,041.15c viśve mama śrutā havam //
analyzed: viśve mama śruta havam

original: RV_2,041.16a ambitame nadītame devitame sarasvati /
